msg: AXIS-2157: The server side of the jaxrpc sample should use ServerHandler instead of ClientHandler. The sample now has the expected output:

author: veithen
msg: Fixed an issue in the migration of the jaxrpc sample: the hello service should use a static WSDD (with a manually configured JAX-RPC handler) instead of the generated WSDD.
